item.title: What Time The Superman Movie Trailer Releases
item.description: The first trailer for James Gunn’s DCU Superman movie has been teased, complete with the exact time it will be released online for everyone to see.

item.title: Queer Writer Offers Key Clue To Understanding The Centipede Symbol: “Certainly Something That Was Really Important To Luca”
item.description: EXCLUSIVE: Queer writer Justin Kuritzkes offers a key clue to understanding the movie's centipede symbol, which constantly appears throughout.

item.title: Chris Evans’ Captain America Return Just Received Its Biggest Update & A Major Avengers: Doomday Theory Explains How It Is Possible
item.description: A new Avengers: Doomsday theory reveals how Chris Evans could be back as Captain America in the MCU movie after a major Steve Rogers update.
